import './Cart.css' import Plus from '../Images/plus.png' import Minus from '../Images/minus.png' import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function Cart(){ const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0); // State to manage the quantity const handleIncrement = () => { setQuantity(prevQuantity => prevQuantity + 1); // Increment the quantity by 1 }; const handleDecrement = () => { if (quantity > 0) { setQuantity(prevQuantity => prevQuantity - 1); // Decrement the quantity by 1 if greater than 0 } }; return( <>

Your Cart

) }
